answers.answer: That's good news congrats, how long did it take for them to call you back with the results?....i go for the test this Thursday at 9 and i don't want to wait till my next appointment to find out
I just got my results back today too! I had mine done on sat.

I had mine done on Thursday and they called today. All I suggest is that you follow the directions on the drink. And the drink wasn't bad tasted like flat orange soda. And thank you. Im so happy because they say if your mother had it you'll have it.. im just glad I dont have to go through the 3 hr one ibate blood being drawn.

question: I was so excited when I got a call from dr office saying my results for my glucose test came back normal.  I was worried because my mom had gestational diabetes with me and made me worried that might be the reason why my son is measuring big. But they did tell me I am slightly anemic so I am on iron for the remainder of my pregnancy.  Im 26+5...
title: results came back normal
